text:
[Swooshipedia frontend/] 4 new commits:
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/4f847dce453f3cf023ba50d712d082b5202c9b4f|4f847dce453f>: Eliminated tap delay on iOS devices.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/888ee123aad6d7857125097361a4f4456a33cab1|888ee123aad6>: Improved height detection for homepage.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/a4417f7c7ea1fb38bc9e5def91af6bd33cd97136|a4417f7c7ea1>: Home grid adjustments
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/cd06ea309a9d022c9388c47f1af64e2037c2b58c|cd06ea309a9d>: Fixed logo clicks/taps
 - gastonfig
Is it me or is the hero img here too squarish. <@U02613K0X>  / <@U026AP8CM> Do you know if we're uploading the correct image and if the CMS is resizing it correctly?
<http://swish.uncorkedstudios.com/bo-jackson>
i'll double check what's in the cms.
bo, man.
the cms is resizing to 1936x800 and 968x400
This is the asset that gets loaded <https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/ucs-swish/601a9e65ff8ea895/hero_1924x788_0007_03_air_jordan_2x-mdpi.jpg>
A file was shared
Should be something more like the above.
i’ll take a look in a minute after i fix a saving issue that’s going on
Thanks.
is it doing it for all the case studies?
because they looked fine before if i recall correctly
Yes, they looked ok before but I don't know when they started looking this way.
i think it became an issue when i began uploading teaser images. i'm using the same image as i uploaded for the hero image.
Banned doesn’t have a teaser yet though
Is there any chance that this was triggered by our additional of cropping rules for the teaser images? Just troubleshooting in the dark here.
<http://support.jwplayer.com/customer/portal/questions/6062977-video-poster-does-not-display-on-iphone-ipad>
<@U026PHQ3J>: if i am understanding correctly think i'm reading that poster frame images will not reappear?
Looks like the Bo-jackson post is fixed but I'm seeing the same problem in There Is No Finish Line
<@U02618EV1> since the teaser images had the same filename as the heroes, they were being uploaded to the same urls on s3 as the heroes and overwriting them
scott is going to add prefixes to the urls this afternoon to fix the problem
Awesome.

[Swooshipedia frontend/] 6 new commits:
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/0d44038eb8219af273d90fc4caf482e5b4b7f52f|0d44038eb821>: Changing breakpoint to 769 from 768.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/7e1e41ee7cc00437acabe2e662a6fd4fb2ddc688|7e1e41ee7cc0>: Home page code org.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/33844776f974261e5dfea760b53dc530b65ab74f|33844776f974>: Reduced image loading delay.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/460775e3be842377598758fca737e70527a2b04c|460775e3be84>: Only run FastClick on touch devices.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/82ba33a91c393dd87f4e8b578fa4b30e334b2373|82ba33a91c39>: Landing page nav height to match specs.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/5919e3ab46cb0d283a5f294be87d41b18544222a|5919e3ab46cb>: Filter container fixed width on load.
 - gastonfig
<@U02613K0X>: let me know when you and Scott fix the prefix issue, I'll continue uploading teaser images.
does it mess things up if i add non-retina teaser images for the sake of having real content tomorrow? when retina assets arrive i dont mind re-uploading.
<!channel>:
No. I think that would work for now.
ok
